• .y
    1. Has an ASCII form
    2. May or may not fully replace ASCII form
      • Letters that fully replace ASCII forms make the same sound
        • Yogh (Ȝȝ) === G
        • Long S (ſ) === S. Long S has no Majuscule form; Majuscule S remains, while Minuscule s is fully replaced
        • Wynn (Ƿƿ) === W
      • Otherwise, they make similar, but different sounds
        • Ash (Ææ) === Ae; Ash (Ææ) !== A
        • Eth (Ðð) === Dh; Eth (Ðð) !== D
        • Schwa (Əə) !== E
        • Eng (Ŋŋ) === Ng; Eng (Ŋŋ) !== N
        • Ethel (Œœ) === Oe; Ethel (Œœ) !== O
        • Thorn (Þþ) === Th; Thorn (Þþ) !== T
        • Zhed (Ʒʒ) === Zh; Zhed (Ʒʒ) !== Z
      • Xx has alternates that aren't phonetic (Majuscule: Dotted Ring, Minuscule: Underdot)
  • .none
    1. Has no Non-ASCII form
Aa Bb Cc Dd Ee Ff Gg Hh Ii Jj Kk Ll Mm Nn Oo Pp Qq Rr Ss Tt Uu Vv Ww Xx Yy Zz
Mæ̣dʒəs_kjul (Majuscule) Æ B C Ð Ə F G H I J K L M Ŋ Œ P Q R S Þ U V Ƿ ◌ (For Diacritics) Y Ʒ
Mịnəs_kjul (Minuscule) æ b c ð ə f g h i j k l m ŋ œ p q r s þ u v ƿ ̣ (Emphasis (Only placed on vowels)) y ʒ
